dc_description_s: Field Description longitude The anonymized longitude of the incident latitude The anonymized latitude of the incident Jurisdiction Responsible department for the region call came in from Master_Incident_Number A concatenation of the 2-digit year in which the incident was created, followed by a dash and then a 6-digit number of sequence for the agency Division A major component of a bureau Problem The nature of the incident that was created Response_Date The timestamp of when the incident was created into the system (UTC Time) Time The time of when the incident was created into the system DayOfWeek The day of the week of when the incident was created into the system Day The integer value of the day of when the incident was created into the system Month The integer value of the month of when the incident was created into the system Year The integer value of the year of when the incident was created into the system
